emr_vis_nlp.ml.deprecated

Class WekaDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • emr_vis_nlp.ml.deprecated.WekaDemo

  • public class WekaDemo
extends java.lang.Object
    A little demo java program for using WEKA.
    Check out the Evaluation class for more details.
    See Also:
    Evaluation
